GK19bahcar3u:501: tataḥ pariṇate divase kenāpi karmasādhanāya kṛtarudhirabalividhānāsviva lohitāyamānāsu dikṣu rudhirabalilampaṭāsu ca belālajihvāsviva lambamānāsu ca ravidīdhitiṣu,
GK19bahcar3u:502: narendrānurāgeṇa gṛhītāparadiśi svayamiva dikpālatāṃ cikīrṣati savitari,
GK19bahcar3u:505: nabhasi puñjībhavati raudraṃ karma didṛkṣamāṇā iva nakṣatragaṇe vigāḍhāyāṃ śarvaryām,
GK19bahcar3u:507_0: rājā sāntaḥpuraṃ parijanaṃ vañcayitvā vāmakarasphuratsarurdakṣiṇakareṇotkhāta khaḍgamaṭṭahāsamādāya
GK19bahcar3u:507_2: rājalakṣmyā pṛṣṭhataḥ parimalalagnamadhukaraveṇivyājena keśeṣviva karmasiddhimākarṣannekākī nagarānniragāt /
GK19bahcar3u:509: atha pratyupajagmuste trayo 'pi drauṇikṛpakṛtavarmāṇa iva sauptike saṃnaddhāḥ snātāḥ sragviṇo gṛhītavikaṭaveṣāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:511: itarakarṇāvalambināṃ ratnakuṇḍalānāmacchayā rucā gorocanayeva mantraparijaptayā samālabdhāṅgāḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:518: āccakṣire ca svaṃ sva nāma trayo 'pi te /
GK19bahcar3u:519_2: niḥśabdāṃ ca gambhīrāṃ ca bhīṣaṇāṃ ca sādhanabhūmim /
GK19bahcar3u:520: tasyāṃ ca kumudadhūlidhavalena bhasmanā likhitasya mahato maṇḍalasya madhye sthitaṃ dīptataratejaḥprasaram,
GK19bahcar3u:523: raktacandanānulepino raktasragambarābharaṇasyottānaśayasya śavasyorasyupaviśya jātajātavedasi mukhakuhare prārabdhāgnikāryam,
GK19bahcar3u:533: aṃsāvalambinā bahuguṇena vidyārājeneva brahnasūtraṇa parigṛhītaṃ bhairavācāryamapaśyat /
GK19bahcar3u:536: atrāntare pātālasvāmī śātakratavīmāśāmahgīcakāra, karṇatālaḥ koberīmparivrāṭ prācetasīm /
GK19bahcar3u:538_0: evaṃ cāvasthiteṣu dikpāleṣu dikpālabhujapañjarapraviṣṭe visrabdhaṃ karma sādhayati
GK19bahcar3u:538_1: bhairavaṃ bhairavācārye 'ticiraṃ ca kṛtakolāhaleṣu niṣphalaprayatnaṣu pratyūhakāriṣu
GK19bahcar3u:540: mahāvarāhapīvaraskandhapīṭho narakāsura iva bhuvo garbhādudbhūto balidānava iva bhitvotthitaḥ pātālam,
GK19bahcar3u:543: gadgadatayā svarasya svabhāvapāṭalatayā ca cakṣuṣaḥ kṣība iva yauvanamadena valgadgaladāmakaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:544: karasaṃpuṭamṛditayā mṛdā diṅnāgakumbhābhāvaṃsakūṭaupunaḥpunaḥ paripaṅkayan sāndracandanakardamadattairavyavasthāsthāsakairatisitajaladharaśakalaśārita iva śāradākāśaikadeśaḥ,
GK19bahcar3u:546: kajñyābandhaṃ vidhāya vilāsavikṣiptena dhavalavyāyāmaphālīpaṭāntena dharaṇitalagatena dhāryamāṇa iva pṛṣṭhataḥ śepeṇa,
GK19bahcar3u:548_0: bhūmibhaṅgabhayeneva mantharāṇi sthāpayanpadāni nirbharagarvaguru kathamapi śailamiva
GK19bahcar3u:548_1: gātramudvahan darpeṇa muhurmuhururasi dviguṇite doṣṇi vāme tiryagutkṣipte ca dakṣiṇe
GK19bahcar3u:548_2: jaṅghākāṇḍe kuṇḍalite ca caṇḍāsphoṭanaṭāṅkāraiḥ karṇavighnanirghātāniva pātayannekendriyavikalamiva
GK19bahcar3u:548_3: jīvalokaṃ kurvan kuvalayaśyāmalaḥ puruṣa ujjagāma jagāda ca vihasya narasiṃhanādanirghoṣaghorayā
GK19bahcar3u:548_4: bhāratyā--“bho vidyādharośraddhākāmuka! kimayaṃ “vadyāvalepaḥ sahāyamado vā yadasmai
GK19bahcar3u:550: etāvatā kālena kṣetrādhipatirasya mannāmnaiva labdhavyapadeśasya deśasya nāgataste śrotropakaṇṭhaṃ śrīkaṇṭhanāmā nāgo 'ham?
GK19bahcar3u:551: anicchati mayi kā śaktirgrahaṇasyāpi gantuṃ gagane /
GK19bahcar3u:553: sahasvedānīṃ sahāmunā durnarendreṇa durnayasya phalam' ityabhidhāya ca niṣṭhuraiḥ prakoṣṭhaprahāraistrīnapi ṭīṭibhaprabhṛtīnabhimukhaṃ pradhāvitān saśarīrāvaraṇakṛpāṇānapātayat /
GK19bahcar3u:554_4: vyapagamanāśaṅkyā nāgadamanamantramaṇḍalabandheneva rundhan daśadiśo naranāthaḥ sāvajñamavādīt--“are
GK19bahcar3u:554_5: kākodara kāka! mayi sthite rājahaṃse na jihreṣi baliṃ yācitum?
GK19bahcar3u:562: narapatirapi nirāyudhamāyudhena yudhi lajjamāno jetumutsṛjya sacarmaphalakamaṭṭahāsamasimardhoruksayopari babandha bāhuyuddhāya kakṣyām /
GK19bahcar3u:563: yuyudhāte ca nirdayāsphoṭanasphuṭitabhujarudhiraśīkarasicyamānau śilāstambhairiva patadbhirbāhudaṇḍaiḥ śabdamayamiva kurvāṇau bhuvanaṃ tau /
GK19bahcar3u:564: na cirācca pātayāmāya bhūtale bhujaṅgamaṃ bhūpatiḥ /
GK19bahcar3u:569: yato viśrabdhamevācarasi cāpalāni' ityuktvotsasarja ca tam /
GK19bahcar3u:574: atha karatalasthitasyāṭṭahāsasya madhye taḍitamiva nīlajaladharodare sphurantīṃ prabhayā pibantīmiva triyāmām,
GK19bahcar3u:577: karapaṅkajasaṃkocāśaṅkayā śaśāṅkamaṇḍalamiva khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtaṃ nirmalacaraṇanakhanivahanibhena bibhratīm,
GK19bahcar3u:592: asaṃbhrāntaśca papraccha--“bhadre! kāsi, kimarthaṃ vā darśanapathamāgatāsi?' iti /
GK19bahcar3u:593: sā tu strījanaviruddhenāvaṣṭembhenābhivantīvābhāṣata tam--“vīra! viddhi māṃ nārāyaṇoraḥsthalīlīlāvihārahariṇīm,
GK19bahcar3u:603: vīrāṇāṃ tvapunaruktāḥ paropakārāḥ yato rājā tāṃ praṇamya svārthavimukho bhairavācāryasya siddhiṃ yayāce /
GK19bahcar3u:604: lakṣmīstu devī prītatarahṛdayā vistīryamāṇena cakṣuṣā kṣīrodenevopari paryastenābhiṣiñcantī bhūpālam “evamastu' ityabravīt /
GK19bahcar3u:606_0: yasminnutpatsyate sarvadvīpānāṃ bhoktā hariścandra iva harṣanāmā cakravartī tribhuvanavijigīṣurdvitīyo
GK19bahcar3u:606_1: māndhāteva yasyāyaṃ karaḥ svayameva kamalamapahāya grīhaṣyati cāmaram' iti vacaso 'nte tirobabhūva /
GK19bahcar3u:608: bhairavācāryo 'pi tasyā devyāstena vacasā karmaṇā ca samyagupapāditena sadya eva kuntalo kirīṭī kuṇḍalī hārī keyūrī mekhalī mudgarī khaḍhgī ca bhūtvāvāpa vidyādharatvam /
GK19bahcar3u:611: svapne 'pyasaṃbāvitāṃ dātumimāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ kṣamaḥ ko 'nyo bhavantamapahāya /
GK19bahcar3u:613: tvadoyairguṇairupakaraṇīkṛtasya tvatta eva ca labdhātmalābhasya nirlajjate yamasya mūḍhahṛdayasya /
GK19bahcar3u:617: sādhayatu mānyo yathāsamīhitaṃ sthānam' iti pratyācacakṣe /
GK19bahcar3u:618_0: tathoktaśca bhūbhujā jigamiṣuḥ sudṛḍhaṃ samāliṅgya ṭīṭibhādīn kuvalayavanenevāśyāyaśīkarasrāviṇā
GK19bahcar3u:618_1: sāsreṇa cakṣuṣā vokṣamāṇaḥ kṣitipatiṃ punaruvāca--“tāta! bravīmi yāmīti na snehasadṛśam /
GK19bahcar3u:627: sarvathā kṛtaghnālāpeṣvasajjanakathāsu ca cetasi kartavyo 'yaṃ svārthaniṣṭhuro janaḥ' ityabhidhāya vegacchinnahārocchalitamuktāphalanikaratāḍitatārāgaṇaṃ gaganatalamutpapāta /
GK19bahcar3u:629: śrīkaṇṭho 'pi--“rājan! parākramakrītaḥ kartavyeṣu niyogenānugrāhyo grāhitavinayo 'yaṃ janaḥ' ityabhidhāya rājānumoditastadeva bhūyo bhūvivaraṃ viveśa /
GK19bahcar3u:632: vanadevatākucāṃśukāpaharaṇaparihāsasvedinīva sāvaśyāyaśīkare parimalākṛṣṭamadhukṛti kumudanidrāvāhini niśāpariṇatijaḍe tuṣāraleśini vanānile,
GK19bahcar3u:635: unnidrapakṣiṇi kṣarati kusumavisaramiva tuhinakaṇanikaraṃ mṛdupavanalāsitalate kānane,
GK19bahcar3u:637: ujjihānaravirathavājivisṛṣṭaiḥ prothapaṭupavanaiḥ protsāyamāṇāsviva vāruṇyāṃ kakubhi puñjībhavantīṣu śyāmālatākalikāsu tārakāsu,
GK19bahcar3u:639: suravāraṇāṅkuśa iva cyute galati tārāmaye mṛge trīnapi ṭīṭibhādīn gṛhītvā nāgayuddhavyatikaramalīmasāni śucini vanavāpīpayasi prakṣālyāṅgāni nagaraṃ viveśa /
GK19bahcar3u:641: katipayadivasāpagame ca piravrāḍ bhūbhujā vāryamāṇo 'pi vanaṃ yayau /
GK19bahcar3u:643_1: prathamamupayujyamānau kathāntareṣu cāntarāntarā samādiṣṭo vicitrāṇi bhairavācāryacaritāni
GK19bahcar3u:644: iti mahākaviśrībāṇabhaṭṭakṛte harṣacarite rājadarśanaṃ nāma dṛtīya ucchvāsaḥ
